text: ijeon-e abeulaham-eun geuui abeojileul wihae yongseoleul giwonhaess-euna ineun geuga abeojiege yagsog-i iss eossgi ttaemun-ila geuleona abeojiga hananim-e geoyeoghago iss-eum-i bunmyeonghaess eul ttae geuneun abeojileul uijeolhaess-euni sillo abeulaham-on ma-eum-i onsunhayeo seulpeum-eul eogjehayeossdeola
